Welcome to the Court

by Baylee Staufenbiel on March 3, 2021 Share on:

Welcome to the Court!

This data set uses Old Bailey Proceedings to investigate how female medical practitioners understood the body. What knowledge did they use to impact criminal proceedings in the name of the crown? What medical misconceptions did they perpetuate or challenge?
